comment: VERY EASY CLASS!!!! Don't really have to show up that often! 2 test, one presentation and a final is all that you have to do. She thinks she is the funniest person ever!

She LOVES the West Wing.  Act like you like it too and she will love you for it.  She is sassy- so dont think she is scarry.  It is just here sense of humor. You will spend lots of time on WHEN HARRY MET SALLY.

Prof. Galloy is sarcastic as anything but she is soooo funny once you understand her sense of humor. She scared the crap out of me the first couple of classes, I was almost afraid to stay in the class - but now, I just love her. I wish she taught more uppe
She is tough but fair. Easy class. Ms. Galloy has a sarcastic sense of humor.I didn't find it mean at all. I found her funny.

Class is incredibly fun. Requires 2 papers. Creative assignments. She makes a lot of jokes but most of them are her making fun of someone else- not the nicest person. I enjoyed the course, but could have done without her "I was the #1 snot at my high school" attitude.

This teacher is easy, but she is also the most unapproachable and sarcastic person I have met at KSU. If you want to like your teacher, chose someone else.... If you just want an A, her class is the way to go.
She's awesome and makes it fun
